useCases.title: Reconciliations
useCases.preview: Ensure accuracy and consistency in financial reporting
useCases.description: Reconciliation is the process of comparing financial records (ledgers, statements, balances) to ensure accuracy, consistency, and completeness in reporting. It detects errors, discrepancies, and fraud, and is critical for financial integrity.

subUseCases.title: Bank Reconciliation
subUseCases.preview: Match bank statements with internal records
subUseCases.description: Automatically match bank statements with internal records to identify discrepancies, outstanding transactions, and ensure accurate cash positions.

subUseCases.title: Credit Card Reconciliation
subUseCases.preview: Reconcile credit card transactions and statements
subUseCases.description: Match credit card transactions with receipts and invoices, categorize expenses, and ensure all charges are properly recorded and authorized.

subUseCases.title: Intercompany Reconciliation
subUseCases.description: Ensure transactions between related entities are properly recorded and balanced across all subsidiary and parent company books.

subUseCases.title: Account Reconciliation
subUseCases.description: Verify general ledger account balances against supporting documentation, identify variances, and ensure accuracy of financial statements.

useCases.title: Accruals
useCases.preview: Track revenues and expenses with precision timing
useCases.description: Accruals refer to tracking revenues and expenses when they are earned or incurred, not when cash changes hands. Automating accruals reduces manual effort, errors, and improves auditability.

subUseCases.title: Predictive Accruals
subUseCases.description: Use AI and historical data to automatically predict and calculate accruals for utilities, rent, and other regular expenses that haven't been invoiced yet.

subUseCases.title: Purchase Order Accruals
subUseCases.preview: Automate accruals for received but unbilled goods
subUseCases.description: Automatically create accruals for goods received but not yet invoiced, ensuring accurate financial reporting by matching purchase orders with receipts.

subUseCases.title: Revenue Accruals
subUseCases.description: Automatically accrue revenue for services delivered or goods shipped but not yet invoiced, maintaining accurate revenue recognition.

subUseCases.title: Multi-Entity Accruals
subUseCases.description: Manage accruals across multiple legal entities and currencies with automatic consolidation and elimination entries for group reporting.

useCases.title: Flux Analysis
useCases.preview: Evaluate and explain significant account variations
useCases.description: Flux (variance) analysis evaluates and explains significant changes in financial accounts between periods to uncover drivers behind fluctuations.

subUseCases.title: Budget vs Actual Analysis
subUseCases.description: Automatically analyze budget versus actual performance, identifying significant variances and providing detailed explanations for deviations.

subUseCases.title: Period-over-Period Analysis
subUseCases.description: Compare financial performance across different time periods, identifying trends and explaining month-over-month or year-over-year variations.

subUseCases.title: Trend Analysis
subUseCases.description: Analyze historical data to identify trends, seasonality patterns, and predict future financial performance with AI-driven insights.

useCases.title: Month-End Close
useCases.description: Month-end close involves consolidating all financial activities for the periodâ€”reviewing ledgers, reconciling accounts, verifying transactions, and preparing statements for management.

subUseCases.title: Consolidated Close Checklists
subUseCases.description: Create and manage comprehensive close checklists with automated task tracking, dependency management, and real-time progress monitoring across teams.

subUseCases.title: AI-Driven Close
subUseCases.description: Leverage AI to predict close timeline, identify bottlenecks, automate journal entries, and provide intelligent recommendations for faster period close.

subUseCases.title: Data Consistency Checks
subUseCases.description: Automatically verify data consistency across all financial systems, detect anomalies, and ensure data integrity before finalizing the close.

useCases.title: Monthly Forecasts
useCases.preview: Predict future financial outcomes with AI precision
useCases.description: Monthly forecasting estimates future financial outcomes based on past results, trends, and current data. AI tools automate data aggregation, scenario modelling, and variance analysis.

subUseCases.title: Scenario Planning
subUseCases.description: Create and compare multiple financial scenarios (best case, worst case, most likely) with AI-powered modeling and sensitivity analysis.

subUseCases.title: Rolling Forecasts
subUseCases.description: Maintain dynamic forecasts that continuously update with new data, providing always-current projections for the next 12-18 months.

subUseCases.title: Trend Analysis
subUseCases.description: Analyze historical data to identify trends, seasonal patterns, and growth trajectories to improve forecast accuracy.

useCases.title: AP Validations
useCases.description: AP validation ensures supplier invoices, payments, and purchase orders are matched correctly.

subUseCases.title: Supplier Statement Matching
subUseCases.description: Automatically match supplier statements with AP records to identify discrepancies, missing invoices, and payment status.

subUseCases.title: Duplicate Invoice Detection
subUseCases.description: Use AI to detect and flag duplicate invoices before payment, preventing overpayment and maintaining vendor relationships.

subUseCases.title: Three-Way Match
subUseCases.description: Automatically validate that purchase orders, goods receipts, and invoices match before approving payment.

useCases.title: AR Validations
useCases.preview: Match customer payments with issued invoices
useCases.description: AR validation matches customer payments and credit notes against issued invoices.

subUseCases.title: Receipt Matching
subUseCases.description: Automatically match customer payments to outstanding invoices using AI-powered matching algorithms and payment references.

subUseCases.title: Under/Overpayment Detection
subUseCases.description: Detect and flag under or overpayments automatically, creating follow-up tasks and maintaining accurate AR aging reports.

subUseCases.title: Automated Reminders
subUseCases.description: Send automated, personalized payment reminders based on customer payment history and aging schedules.

useCases.title: Payment Setup & Process
useCases.preview: Automate payment methods and transaction processing
useCases.description: Payment setup involves establishing payment methods, validating bank info, scheduling payments, and automating transactions.

subUseCases.title: Bank Setup & Validation
subUseCases.description: Set up and validate bank accounts with automated verification, ensuring secure payment processing and compliance.

subUseCases.title: Batch Payment Automation
subUseCases.description: Automate batch payment processing with scheduling, approval workflows, and multi-currency support.

subUseCases.title: Compliance & Fraud Detection
subUseCases.description: Monitor payments for fraud patterns, ensure regulatory compliance, and maintain audit trails for all transactions.
